overview: Winner of "Best Science Fiction Film" at Midwest Weirdfest, this off-kilter, raunchy, absurdist romp features fatally flawed aliens, a universe split into two (oddly familiar) political factions, and the endearingly dim Tangoborn Menclenty, whose job it is to save the Earth!
tagline: The aliens have sent us a savior. We're not having it.
title: Tangoborn Menclenty
